title: World of change: world of promise
creator_credit: Cinemakers, Carol Hale and William B. Hartigan
brief_description: Shows the contribution of the World Association of Girl Guides to the changing role of Women in all countries. The work of guides in four contrasting countries - India, Finland, Paraguay and Acapulco - is shown. Despite the different approaches to guiding, the common goals of community awareness and self-improvement are universal.
